title: Reverse a String
description: Write a Python function that reverses a string.
test:
def passTest():
	solution = Solution()
	param = ['a', 'apple', 'tomato', 'I love python', 'a1c1e1g']
	ans = ['a', 'elppa', 'otamot', 'nohtyp evol I', 'g1e1c1a']
	for i in range(5):
		if ans[i] == solution.reverseString(param[i]):
			continue
		else
			return False
	return True
passedTest = 'Passed all test cases' if passTest() else 'Test cases failed'
print(passedTest)
